meanings.definition: Extremely inexpensive or low in price.
meanings.sent1: I found a supercheap shirt at the thrift store.
meanings.sent2: The supermarket is selling supercheap fruits this week.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that the supercheap sunglasses I bought will break after one use.
meanings.sent4: The supercheap hotel room felt like a luxurious suite to me.
meanings.sent5: She was thrilled to discover a supercheap flight for her vacation.

meanings.definition: Of very low quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The supercheap toy broke as soon as I opened the box.
meanings.sent2: I regret buying that supercheap phone; it keeps freezing.
meanings.sent3: The supercheap umbrella flipped inside out in the first gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: His supercheap imitation watch turned out to be a fake.
meanings.sent5: The supercheap shoes fell apart after just a few days of wear.
